rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0001
rows.name:
Acedia has committed a taboo...
Forcibly controlling another Divine Beast
is an unforgivable act.

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0002
rows.name:
Everyone, please be extremely cautious
of Acedia's movements.

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0003
rows.name:
The peace that Alst has known for these 500 years,
in a sense, may be coming
to an end.

rows.label: tlk006301_08_msg0004
rows.name:
Anything can happen now,
so please, be extremely careful...
